price: Onlara okununca derler ki: Ona iman ettik, çünkü o Rabbimizden gelen haktır. Biz önceden de müslüman idik.
arabic: وَإِذَا يُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦٓ إِنَّهُ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبۡلِهِۦ مُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā yut'lā ʿalayhim qālū āmannā bihi innahu al-ḥaqu min rabbinā innā kunnā min qablihi mus'limīna
